issue.title: [R] Clean up documentation before release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5773](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5773). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The R package documentation is lackluster. Try to polish the docs for at least the key end-user functions and add enough examples so that CRAN won't use that as an excuse to reject.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5773?focusedCommentId=16874968) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4736
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4736>
